member.name: E:Pilz.Cryptography.AESStringCrypter.NeedKey
member.summary: This event throws if no key and no default key was found. You can now provide a key or default key (maybe depending on the given instance). If no value is provided, a default key will be created.

member.name: E:Pilz.Cryptography.AESStringCrypter.NeedIV
member.summary: This event throws if no IV and no default IV was found. You can now provide a IV or default IV (maybe depending on the given instance). If no value is provided, a default IV will be created.
